solution_line_template: It takes Alexis {time_per_skirt} x {num_skirts} = <<{time_per_skirt}*{num_skirts}={time_for_skirts}>>{time_for_skirts} hours to sew 6 skirts
It takes Alexis another {time_per_coat} x {num_coats} = <<{time_per_coat}*{num_coats}={time_for_coats}>>{time_for_coats} hours to sew 4 coats.
In total it takes Alexis {time_for_skirts} + {time_for_coats} = <<{time_for_skirts}+{time_for_coats}={total_time}>>{total_time} hours to sew 6 skirts and 4 coats.
